scripts.post-build: if exist public\data\stats.json (copy public\data\stats.json dist\data\stats.json) else (if exist public\data\stats.production.json copy public\data\stats.production.json dist\data\stats.json)
scripts.prepare-deploy: copy public\data\stats.json public\data\stats.production.json && git add public\data\stats.production.json && git commit -m "Update production stats" || echo "No stats.json found - run npm run process-data first"
